sql-statements.statement: SELECT p.person_id, p.short_sortable_name, TO_CHAR(ps.first_access, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH12:MI AM') as first_access, TO_CHAR(ps.last_access, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH12:MI AM') as last_access, ps.remote_host, ps.remote_addr FROM person_session ps, person p WHERE (ps.status between ? AND ?) AND p.person_id = ps.person_id AND ps.person_id = ? AND ps.org_internal_id = ? AND rownum <= 250

SELECT p.person_id, p.short_sortable_name, TO_CHAR(ps.first_access, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH12:MI AM') as first_access, TO_CHAR(ps.last_access, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH12:MI AM') as last_access, ps.remote_host, ps.remote_addr FROM person_session ps, person p WHERE (ps.status between ? AND ?) AND p.person_id = ps.person_id AND ps.person_id LIKE ? AND ps.org_internal_id = ? AND rownum <= 250
